modName: Opulent Outfits - Mage Robes of Winterhold v4
summary:
A set of 86 hand-built, 2K Robe textures for the Mages of Winterhold.
Available for ALL races. Now includes awesome Necromancer & Monk Robes. Includes UKSP Patch. Includes optional Vanilla Vibrance pack. Includes 1K Res Pack.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ffff00][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/35002-0-1497195147.png[/img]
[size=4]!!![/size][/color][size=4][color=#7cfc00] [/color][color=#ff0000]This version is [/color][i][color=#ff7700]severely[/color][/i][color=#ff0000] outdated.[/color][color=#7cfc00] [/color][color=#ffff00]!!![/color][/size]
[color=#7cfc00]Please go [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73861/?]here[/url][color=#7cfc00] for the latest, and most up to date version - as brought to you by the mighty [/color][b][color=#ff0000]Mebantiza[/color]
[color=#ffff00][size=5]But first!![/size]
[size=3]Please scroll through the info here, then head over to the updated version of this mod[/size][/color][/b]

[u]PLEASE NOTE[/u]
Modification & Adaptation of these mods is now permitted. All I ask for is a credit.
(: PEACE :)

Keep up the massively awesome work!!
